name: Online forms
tagline: online forms plugin for any html based platform
body:
### Using online forms ?
This ***online forms*** plugin is free of charge, and you will be able to build stunning [online forms](https://formtitan.com) with zero coding.
simply install and in few configuration clicks its up and running.


### Drag and Drop Form Designer 
our online forms tool is based on angular and jquery, its fully support drag and drop and keyboard operations.
its like a nice game to build nice forms and even if you are a top notch developer...why to build it from scratch ?

### embed your forms any where
you will be able to embed your online forms in many platofmrs : html,wordpress,facebook,twitter...name it, its there.
if we are missing any publish option, let us know, we are friendly and we will have no problems to hear about bugs and requested features.


### Support or Contact
Having trouble with our online forms plugin? Check out our [formtitan support](https://support.formtitan.com) or [contact support](https://formtitan.com/contactus) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
